channel.title: Carolan on Wheeler Genealogy
channel.description: Recent content in Carolan on Wheeler Genealogy

item.title: Michael McGinty: From County Leitrim to Chicago
item.description: Born in County Leitrim, Michael McGinty built a life in Chicago—marriage, five sons, work as a plumber, and a long run in the city’s Irish-American neighborhoods.

item.title: Michael McGinty (52 Ancestors; #4 Michael McGinty)
item.description: I am currently in a genealogy certificate class at Boston University. One of our first projects was to select a family and review the 1920 and 1930 census for that family. I have reviewed lots of census records over the years but I don’t know that I have looked at them in quite this way before. Michael McGinty was born 22 Oct 1871 in Bellageheer, Mohill, Leitrim, Ireland. Michael was the son of Michael Ginty (b. abt. 1831 in Leitrim, Ireland) and Elizabeth McGarry.
